WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 30+ days without response. If it is still an issue, please resubmit against current versions and provide current files.
WorkItem.Description:
How do I delete the optimizer item list?
I tried to create a set for my prot warrior, but I couldn't find a way to remove the optimizer item list from my mage
In the end, I ended up redownloaded Rawr to get rid of the item list, but shouldn't there be a way to remove it in the program itself?
 
And if there's a possibility to do that, wouldn't it be a good idea to add that to the Tour of Rawr video about the optimizer?
 
Edit: hope I posted this in the correct section, I'm a bit new to Rawr

Comments.Message: That doesn't make any sense. Your ProtWarr and Mage character files should be two separate files, if you were trying to use the same file for both characters, of course it isn't going to work.
